headline: RTX (RTX) Valuation Check After 56% One-Year Rally and Portfolio Reshaping
summary: RTX has quietly turned into one of the market’s steadier compounders, with the stock up about 12% over the past 3 months and more than 56% over the past year. See our latest analysis for RTX. Momentum has clearly been building, with RTX’s latest share price near $177 and a strong year-to-date share price return feeding into a powerful 1 year and multi year total shareholder return story as investors reassess both growth prospects and balance sheet resilience. If RTX’s run has you rethinking...
